mapper.select:
select fid id,fwelder_no welderNo,fname welderName from tb_welder where 1=1
and ${str}
select fequipment_no fequipment_no from tb_welding_machine where fposition=#{fposition}
select fid fdi,fname fdn,fparent fdp,ftype fdt from tb_insframework where tb_insframework.fparent=#{fci}
select tb_users.users_insframework from tb_users where tb_users.id=#{fci}
select fid fdn from tb_insframework where tb_insframework.fname=#{fdn}
select fname fcn from tb_insframework where tb_insframework.fid=#{fci}
select tb_welder.fname from tb_welder where tb_welder.fwelder_no=#{fci}
select fposition from tb_welding_machine where fequipment_no=#{equip}

select wm.fid id,wm.fequipment_no fequipment_no,max(fposition) fposition,max(finsframework_id) fci,max(tb_insframework.fname) fcn, max(ftype_id) typeid,max(fmodel) fpp,g.FGATHER_NO fstatus_id,d.fvaluename model from tb_welding_machine wm LEFT JOIN TB_GATHER g ON wm.FGATHER_ID = g.FID LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary d on d.fvalue = wm.fmodel LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ON wm.finsframework_id=tb_insframework.fid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = tb_insframework.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid=ins.fparent where 1=1
and (tb_insframework.fid=#{parent} or ins.fid=#{parent} or insf.fid=#{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})
and ${str}
GROUP BY wm.FID,fequipment_no,g.FGATHER_NO,d.fvaluename ORDER BY nlssort(fequipment_no,'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')

select wm.fid id,fequipment_no fequipment_no,max(fposition) fposition,max(finsframework_id) fci, max(tb_insframework.fname) fcn,max(d.fvaluename) model,g.FGATHER_NO fstatus_id from tb_welding_machine wm inner JOIN TB_GATHER g ON wm.FGATHER_ID = g.FID LEFT JOIN tb_dictionary d on d.fvalue = wm.fmodel LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ON wm.finsframework_id=tb_insframework.fid LEFT JOIN tb_insframework ins on ins.fid = tb_insframework.fparent LEFT JOIN tb_insframework insf on insf.fid=ins.fparent where d.ftypeid=17
and (tb_insframework.fid=#{parent} or ins.fid=#{parent} or insf.fid=#{parent} or insf.fparent=#{parent})
GROUP BY wm.FID,fequipment_no,g.FGATHER_NO ORDER BY nlssort(fequipment_no,'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')
select fid fname,fwelder_no fwelder_no from tb_welder

SELECT sum(worktime) worktime FROM ( SELECT count(fid) worktime from tb_live_data where FWeldTime >= to_date(substr(#{totime},1,19), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and FWeldTime <= SYSDATE and fmachine_id=#{machineid} and (fstatus=3 or fstatus=5 or fstatus=7 or fstatus=99) union all SELECT sum(fworktime) worktime FROM tb_work WHERE fstarttime >= to_date(substr(#{time},1,19), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and fendtime <= to_date(substr(#{totime},1,19), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and fmachine_id=#{machineid} )temp
